grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 称号【ショウゴウ】title, name, degree
通称【ツウショウ】popular name, common name, nickname, alias
公称【コウショウ】public name, announcing publicly, nominal
kun reading compounds: 称える【たたえる】to extol, to give praise
称える【となえる】to assume the name of
褒める【ほめる】to praise, to admire, to speak well of someone
